attributes.action: Stop British Waterways from selling off any more houses from their portfolio which is damaging the heritage and integrity of our Waterways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British Waterways are currently undertaking selling off a huge number of their canalside cottages and former workers' cottages.These are being sold off to individuals who modernise and extend them, thus changing forever the appearance of the waterside environment that we all know.
